brief.brief: Determines whether to display the Regen option to the operator.

If the condition is true, the operator can use the Regen option to rebuild all indexes for every record in the current database table. Service Manager locks all users out of this table while the regen is running.
Important: Do not stop the regen process. If the regen stops before completion, the unprocessed records may not be available to the users.
